author: gmonroe
msg: Fix for TORQUE-53. Added better conversion handling in Village for BigDecimal values.  Double and Float types will be converted using appropriate constructors rather than the somewhat buggy BigDecimal(String) constructor.
Also reformatted Value.java to Torque standard line lengths.
